issue.title: Request panel not shown when wfs filter too long
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

When a user manager requests, if the user made an order with a lot of wfs features, the request is too long in the request panel and the browser crashes.
I fixed it by limiting the size of the url but the request should be passed in a post request.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

We'll use an @OpenLayers.Protocol.WFS@ with POST method and @OpenLayers.Filter.*@
